topic.title: Physician Reading Study Performer2 - conformance rules

section.p: This participant is the Physician Reading Study Performer defined in documentationOf/serviceEvent. It is usually different from the attending physician. The reading physician interprets the images and evidence of the study (DICOM Definition).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-30773, CONF:1098-30774, CONF:1098-32564 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Physician Reading Study Performer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.1)
SHALL conform to Physician Reading Study Performer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.1)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8425, R2.0=CONF:1098-8425)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:8426, R2.0=CONF:1098-8426)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10033, R2.0=CONF:1098-10033)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8427, R2.0=CONF:1098-8427)
SHALL contain a valid DICOM personal identification code sequence (@codeSystem is 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4) or an appropriate national health care provider coding system (e.g., NUCC in the U.S., where @code is 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101). (CONF:8428, R2.0=CONF:1098-8428)
Every assignedEntity element SHALL have at least one assignedPerson or representedOrganization. (CONF:8429, R2.0=CONF:1098-8429)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:10034, R2.0=CONF:1098-32135)

body.codeblock: <performer1 xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" typeCode="PRF"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.1" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.1"/> <time> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </time> <assignedEntity/> </performer1>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8423 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.1"
Consol Physician Reading Study Performer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:8425, R2.0=CONF:1098-8425)
Consol Physician Reading Study Performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF" (CONF:8424, R2.0=CONF:1098-8424)
Consol Physician Reading Study Performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Assigned Entity (CONF:8426, R2.0=CONF:1098-8426)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""

Consol Assigned Entity SHALL contain a valid DICOM personal identification code sequence (@codeSystem is 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4) or an appropriate national health care provider coding system (e.g., NUCC in the U.S., where @code is 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101). (CONF:8428, R2.0=CONF:1098-8428)
Consol Assigned Entity Every assignedEntity element SHALL have at least one assignedPerson or representedOrganization. (CONF:8429, R2.0=CONF:1098-8429)
Consol Assigned Entity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:10034, R2.0=CONF:1098-32135)
SHALL conform to CDA Assigned Entity
Consol Assigned Entity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10033, R2.0=CONF:1098-10033)
Consol Assigned Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8427, R2.0=CONF:1098-8427)
